channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: For the First Time, Mutations in a Single Gene Have Been Linked to Mental Illness
item.description: Research links variations in the gene GRIN2A to a higher risk of developing schizophrenia and other forms of mental illness.

item.title: The Best Cookbooks of 2025: Soju Party, Fat and Flour, Salsa Daddy, Italo Punk, and More
item.description: This year's bumper crop looks at salsa, noodles, drinking culture, and home baking.

item.title: Environmental groups call for halt to new data center construction
item.description: More than 230 organizations signed a public letter urging members of Congress to take action.

item.title: JBL Grip Review: A Bluetooth Speaker With Lava Lamp Vibes
item.description: This waterproof ultra-portable comes with a splash of party.

item.title: You can buy your Instacart groceries without leaving ChatGPT
item.description: Shoppers will be able to go from recipe planning to checkout within the ChatGPT window.

item.title: Google details security measures for Chrome’s agentic features
item.description: Google details how it is enacting security guardrails before rolling out agentic capabilities on Chrome.

item.title: Claude Code is coming to Slack, and that’s a bigger deal than it sounds
item.description: Anthropic launches Claude Code in Slack, letting developers delegate coding tasks from chat threads. It's part of a shift toward AI-embedded collabora...

item.title: The Longest Solar Eclipse for 100 Years Is Coming. Don’t Miss It
item.description: NASA has announced when the longest total solar eclipse of the century will occur—and you won’t have to wait long. Here’s what you should know.

item.title: Tiger Global plans cautious venture future with a new $2.2B fund
item.description: Tiger's last fund did well with investmetments in OpenAI, Waymo and Databricks. But it warns investors that AI valuations are already 'elevated.'

item.title: The 47 Best REI Cyber Week Outdoor Deals (2025)
item.description: Today is the final day of REI's sale, and deals are disappearing fast. Grab what you need with these great deals on tents, packs, and merino wool.
